query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
  overview = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Male is the vibrant capital of the Maldives, a bustling hub of culture, commerce, and history. This densely populated island offers a stark contrast to the serene resort islands, showcasing the authentic local lifestyle. With colorful buildings, busy markets, historic mosques, and excellent restaurants, Male provides an immersive cultural experience.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Maafushi Island is a local island paradise offering authentic Maldivian experience without resort prices. Known for pristine beaches, excellent snorkeling, and warm hospitality. Perfect for travelers seeking genuine experiences.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Thulusdhoo Island is the surfing capital of the Maldives with consistent waves and vibrant beach culture. Ideal for adventure seekers and water sports enthusiasts.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Banana Reef is a world-renowned diving destination with spectacular coral formations and abundant marine life. A must-visit for diving enthusiasts.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Dhigurah Island is famous for whale shark encounters (June-October) and family-friendly atmosphere. Perfect blend of adventure and relaxation.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Ukulhas Island offers authentic glimpse into Maldivian culture with traditional fishing practices and excellent diving opportunities.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Veligandu Island is a luxury resort destination with overwater bungalows and crystal-clear lagoons. Perfect for honeymooners and luxury travelers.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Kandooma Island is a premier diving destination with vibrant coral reefs and professional diving centers.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Fulidhoo Island is a traditional fishing village offering immersive cultural experiences and authentic hospitality.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Haa Alifu Atoll is a remote and exclusive destination with pristine natural beauty and ultimate privacy.'
  END,
  bestSeason = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'March to October (Surfing), November to April (General)'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'June to October (Whale Sharks), November to April (General)'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'November to April'
  END,
  activities = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Mosque visits, Market exploration, Museum tours, Local cuisine tasting, Photography, Shopping'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Snorkeling, Diving, Beach relaxation, Local market visits, Sunset watching, Island hopping'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Surfing, Diving, Snorkeling, Beach volleyball, Nightlife, Water sports'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Photography, Marine life observation, Wreck diving'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Whale shark watching, Snorkeling, Diving, Beach relaxation, Local market visits'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Local market visits, Fishing experiences, Photography'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Spa treatments, Water sports, Diving, Snorkeling, Sunset watching, Fine dining'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Water sports, Spa treatments, Beach relaxation'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Fishing experiences, Local market visits, Snorkeling, Diving, Cultural exploration'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Luxury spa, Fine dining, Beach relaxation'
  END,
  dining = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Seafood restaurants, Local curry houses, International cuisine, Cafes, Street food'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Local guesthouses, Fresh seafood restaurants, Beach cafes, Local curry houses'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Beach bars, Local curry houses, Fresh seafood, International cuisine'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Resort restaurants, Dive center cafes, Local island dining'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Guesthouse restaurants, Fresh seafood, Local curry houses, Beach cafes'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Local family restaurants, Fresh fish market, Traditional Maldivian cuisine'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Fine dining restaurants, International cuisine, Seafood specialties, Beach bars'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Resort restaurants, International cuisine, Seafood specialties, Beach bars'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Family-run restaurants, Fresh seafood, Traditional Maldivian cuisine'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Luxury resort restaurants, Fine dining, International cuisine'
  END,
  packingTips = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Light clothing, Comfortable shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Modest clothing for mosques, Swimwear'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Light clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Light clothing, Swimwear, Surfboard or rental, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Diving certification, Swimwear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Waterproof bag, Diving log book'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Light clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Light clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Light clothing, Swimwear, Elegant wear, Sun protection, Formal evening wear, Reef shoes'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Diving certification, Swimwear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Waterproof bag, Diving log book'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Light clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Light clothing, Swimwear, Elegant wear, Sun protection, Formal evening wear, Reef shoes'
  END,
  healthSafety = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Good medical facilities. Tap water safe. Vaccinations recommended. Travel insurance advised. Respect local customs.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Medical facilities available. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Ensure diving certification. Travel insurance essential. Decompression chambers available. Follow safety guidelines.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Excellent medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Resort security provided.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Good medical facilities. Decompression chambers available. Travel insurance essential. Follow safety guidelines.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Excellent medical facilities. Helicopter evacuation available. Travel insurance essential. Resort security provided.'
  END,
  faqContent = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Q: Best time to visit? A: November to April. Q: How to get around? A: Taxis, buses, ferries. Q: Safe for tourists? A: Yes, use common sense. Q: Main attractions? A: Friday Mosque, National Museum, markets.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Q: How to get there? A: Speedboat from Male (45 min). Q: Is snorkeling safe? A: Yes, with precautions. Q: Cost? A: Budget-friendly. Q: Marine life? A: Excellent snorkeling.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Q: Best surfing season? A: March to October. Q: Need experience? A: Lessons available. Q: How to get there? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: Other activities? A: Diving, nightlife.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Q: Diving level required? A: Open Water minimum. Q: Marine life? A: Fish, rays, sharks, coral. Q: Depth? A: 5-30 meters. Q: Safe? A: Yes, with training.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Q: When to see whale sharks? A: June to October. Q: Guaranteed? A: High probability. Q: How to get there? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: Other activities? A: Diving, snorkeling.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Q: How to get there? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: Local culture? A: Fishing-based, hospitable. Q: Diving available? A: Yes, excellent sites. Q: What to expect? A: Authentic experience.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Q: Accommodation? A: Luxury overwater bungalows. Q: Activities? A: Water sports, diving, spa. Q: Family-friendly? A: Yes. Q: Price? A: Luxury pricing.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Q: Nearby dive sites? A: Multiple world-class sites. Q: Beginner-friendly? A: Yes, with training. Q: Accommodation? A: Resort bungalows. Q: Other activities? A: Snorkeling, spa.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Q: Experience local culture? A: Visit markets, fishing trips. Q: Safe? A: Yes, welcoming. Q: Accommodation? A: Guesthouses. Q: How to get there? A: Speedboat from Male.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Q: How remote? A: Very remote. Q: How to get there? A: Seaplane from Male. Q: Cost? A: Premium pricing. Q: Worth it? A: Yes, pristine and exclusive.'
  END,
  itinerary = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Day 1: Explore Male city, visit Friday Mosque, local dinner. Day 2: National Museum, local markets, shopping, sunset. Day 3: Boat trip to nearby islands, snorkel.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Day 1: Settle in guesthouse, relax on beach. Day 2: Snorkeling trip, coral reefs, fresh seafood. Day 3: Island exploration, market visit, water sports.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Day 1: Settle in, explore beach. Day 2: Surfing or diving, beach activities. Day 3: Water sports, snorkeling, nightlife.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Day 1: Diving briefing. Day 2: Multiple dives at Banana Reef. Day 3: Advanced dives, photography.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Day 1: Settle in, relax on beach. Day 2: Whale shark watching (seasonal), snorkeling. Day 3: Diving, island exploration.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Day 1: Explore local community. Day 2: Diving, snorkeling, market visit. Day 3: Cultural exploration, fishing.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Day 1: Settle in luxury bungalow. Day 2: Water sports, spa, fine dining. Day 3: Diving, snorkeling, beach relaxation.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Day 1: Diving briefing. Day 2: Multiple dives at nearby sites. Day 3: Advanced dives, snorkeling, spa.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Day 1: Meet local family, explore village. Day 2: Fishing experience, market visit, snorkeling. Day 3: Cultural immersion, diving.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive by seaplane, settle in luxury resort. Day 2: Pristine diving and snorkeling. Day 3: Relaxation, spa, fine dining.'
  END
WHERE slug IN ('male-city', 'maafushi-island', 'thulusdhoo-island', 'banana-reef', 'dhigurah-island', 'ukulhas-island', 'veligandu-island', 'kandooma-island', 'fulidhoo-island', 'haa-alifu-atoll')
command:

    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential.'

logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'bestSeason' in 'field list'
